entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 18 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 26.
